title: ORBI CITY - ELIT LUXURY hotel
description: ORBI CITY - ELIT LUXURY hotel provides beachfront accommodations in Batumi.

rooms.name: Deluxe King Studio
rooms.description: The well-fitted kitchen features a stovetop, a refrigerator, kitchenware and an electric kettle. This air-conditioned studio includes a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a private bathroom as well as a terrace with sea views. The unit offers 1 bed.

rooms.name: One-Bedroom Apartment with Balcony and Sea View
rooms.description: Boasting a private entrance, this air-conditioned apartment includes 1 living room, 1 separate bedroom and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hairdryer. In the well-equipped kitchen, guests will find a stovetop, a refrigerator, kitchenware and an electric kettle. Featuring a terrace with sea views, this apartment also offers soundproof walls and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The unit has 2 beds.

rooms.name: Two-Bedroom Apartment with Terrace
rooms.description: Boasting a private entrance, this air-conditioned apartment comes with 1 living room, 2 separate bedrooms and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hairdryer. Guests can make meals in the kitchen that features a stovetop, a refrigerator, kitchenware and an electric kettle. The spacious apartment features a flat-screen TV with cable channels, soundproof walls, a seating area, a dining area as well as sea views. The unit has 3 beds.
